ing: 1 (3.4 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (6 ounce) container berries and cream yogurt
des: "Plump juicy berries combine with bananas and yogurt to make this a delicious dessert.  What's great is it's ready to serve in minutes!!"
ins: Whisk the milk and vanilla pudding together in a bowl for 2 minutes. Let stand for 5 minutes to begin to set. Toss the banana and strawberries in a separate bowl with the lemon juice. Gently fold in the blackberries, blueberries, yogurt, and pudding. Pour into the prepared graham cracker crust and sprinkle with marshmallows to serve.
